::Spears::

She glared at Slayer. She was in the mood to fight and she wanted to 
fight him.  She knew he was bigger and would be a challenge in 
battel, but she felt that she had to try.  Per the chip, she wouldn't 
allow Slayer to dismiss her as a feeble female, but she had to prove 
to him that she was just as deserving of respect as Prebon.  She 
served Prebon and wanted a little acknowlagement for it.  He was, to 
her, nothing anymore.  His body was that of Striker, but the Striker 
she knew was gone forever.  This new bot, wasn't worth the time it 
would take to put him into a trash compactor.  She wanted him slagged 
and she wanted to do the slagging.  He made her mad just by looking 
at her.  She turned to Prebon, then to Slayer to make sure he 
wouldn't hear her,"Master Prebon, why keep him around? Sure when 
Ramulus see's that Striker is gone, he will run. Why not program him 
to be Striker and add a chip to him. With the cip, he will follow 
your every word. And he will be convincing enough for Ramulus." She 
loked down,"Forgive me master, I have spoken out of place."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer::
> 
> Slayer laughs loudly and harshly as Spears pulls out a spear, 
obvioustly 
> planning to attack him. The idea itself was humorous to him. A femm 
attacking 
> him? He was sure the fight wouldn't last more than a nano-cycle. 
His shoulder 
> blasters emerge, his hands closing around both his swords. Slayer 
narrows his 
> eyes, ready for battle.
> 
> He nearly growls in disapointment as he hears his masters orders, 
his 
> shoulder blasters sliding back in, and his hands leaving his 
swords. "I 
> apologize, Master," he says to Prebon, snarling at Spears 
afterwards.
> 
> "Watch yourself, femm," he growls at her, pushing past her and 
walking to the 
> suit.
> 
> He looks it over as he stops near it, not bothering to even glance 
back at 
> Spears, his face breaking into an evil smile. It was excellent. 
Rocket 
> launchers, infared goggles, a pair of swords... (I'm repeating what 
Minime 
> posted about it, not making anything up)
> 
> Slayer picks up the suit and begins to put it on.
